title: perma baned
body: i got perma baned in this acc for flame, i realy wanted to know if there was anyway that i can get unbaned because i spent a lot of money in this account and some way i can show that i wont be toxic anymore

replies.body: It would be up to our Player Behavior team to consider.  You can submit an appeal to them through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they'll be happy to investigate and consider your request.  Good luck!
